summary: This script takes a target IP address as an argument, searches for files with ".js" extension in the current directory, and replaces all occurrences of "localhost:4999" with the provided target IP address and port in each file.

details.comment: This script takes a target IP address as an argument, searches for files with ".js" extension in the current directory, and replaces all occurrences of "localhost:4999" with the provided target IP address and port in each file.
details.content:
target_ip=$1
ls -1 | grep js | xargs -iabc sed -i "s/localhost:4999/$target_ip:4999/g" abc
